fields.label: Provider Type
fields.description: Select 'Custom' for self-hosted (Ollama, vLLM, LiteLLM)

fields.label: API Key
fields.description: Your provider API key. For self-hosted without auth, enter any value.

fields.label: Base URL
fields.description: Default: auto-set per provider. For self-hosted: http://your-server:11434/v1

fields.label: Default Model
fields.description: e.g. gpt-4o-mini, claude-3-5-sonnet-20241022, llama3.1

fields.label: Embedding Model
fields.description: For RAG / Ask ERP. Leave blank to disable embeddings.

fields.label: Embedding Base URL
fields.description: If different from main provider. For self-hosted embeddings.

fields.label: Max Tokens per Request
fields.description: Maximum output tokens per AI call

fields.label: Temperature
fields.description: 0 = deterministic, 1 = creative. 0.3 recommended for ERP tasks.

fields.label: Timeout (seconds)
fields.description: Max wait time for AI response

fields.label: DocTypes to Index
fields.description: Select which DocTypes the AI should learn from. Enable Auto-Index to keep knowledge up-to-date automatically.

fields.label: Enable Role-Based Access Control
fields.description: When enabled, AI features are restricted based on user roles. When disabled, all users get full access.

fields.label: Access Levels by Role
fields.description: Map Frappe roles to AI access tiers. Users inherit the highest tier from their roles.

fields.label: Enable Live Data Queries
fields.description: Allow AI to search and read ERPNext data (respects user permissions)

fields.label: Enable Execute Mode
fields.description: Allow AI to propose document creation/updates (requires approval)

fields.label: Require Approval Before Execution
fields.description: When enabled, all AI actions must be explicitly approved by the user before execution

fields.label: Warn on Dangerous Actions
fields.description: Show extra warnings for Submit, Cancel, Delete operations

fields.label: Max Records per Query
fields.description: Maximum number of records the AI can fetch in a single query

fields.label: Monthly Budget Cap (USD)
fields.description: AI calls stop when this is reached. 0 = unlimited.

fields.label: Daily Request Limit per User
fields.description: Max AI requests per user per day. 0 = unlimited.

fields.label: Current Month Spend (USD)
fields.description: Auto-calculated from usage

fields.label: Enable Response Caching
fields.description: Cache identical requests to reduce API costs by 60-80%

fields.label: Cache TTL (hours)
fields.description: How long to cache responses. 0 = indefinite.

fields.label: Enable Audit Logging
fields.description: Log every AI call to AI Audit Log

fields.label: Enable Cost Tracking
fields.description: Track token usage and estimated costs

fields.label: Log Prompts
fields.description: Store full prompts in audit log (may contain sensitive data)

fields.label: Log Responses
fields.description: Store AI responses in audit log

fields.label: Self-Hosted Info
fields.options:
To switch to self-hosted AI:
  1. Set Provider Type to 'Custom (OpenAI Compatible)'
  2. Set Base URL to your Ollama/vLLM endpoint (e.g. http://your-server:11434/v1)
  3. Set the model name (e.g. llama3.1)
  4. Set API Key to any value (or your server's auth token)

No code changes needed. All features work the same.
